title: I have the iPhone 11 Pro Max. When the iPhone 12 comes out, how much will my phone be worth? - Quora

response.answer_text: Apple have a trade-in web page. It doesn’t list the iPhone 11 family as it is current. However, it is probably reasonable to estimate that the trade-in value of the 11 Pro Max will be similar to that currently offered for the XS Max (“up to $500”), possibly a little more because of “pro”. Apple Trade In
